content: **crochet blanket in 2 different colors with snow** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **finished measure** approx 55 x 100 cm approx 21½ x 39½ inches **materials** drops snow from garnstudio 100 g in following colours no 01 off white no 13 camel nr 31 light mint + girl no 30 light rose boy no 12 light blue 50 g in following colours no 23 dark beige no 37 mint mix + girl no 36 rose mix boy no 21 jeans blue~ crochet gauge 4 double_crochet us /treble_crochet uk groups in the width and 4 row in height =15 x 15 cm **pattern links ** french version 1 also available as 14-21 https //www garnstudio com/pattern php id=2209&cid=17 1 http //www garnstudio com/lang/fr/visoppskrift php d_nr=b13&d_id=21
